title: Perma ban with no prior punishment or warning
body:
Welp got my account perma banned for completely losing it when a pantheon instalocked and forced me to basically mid. I admit I'm an asshole, I'm toxic and I bitch A LOT at the game. 

However I'm not the only person to go crazy in a game like that. I'm playing my ranked to climb and when I get stupid people it bothers me, people make death threats and don't get banned. I would have been fine with long ban but they didn't put me on chat restriction, or any punishment thus far aside from some low piroirty ques from dcing this season. But just instant perma ban? Well riot I've been reported and lost 1 account because I got reported by the same 5 man team for playing them twice in a row, guess toxicity got me this time.  The around $500 if not easily more spent on skins because I supported your game since the begining? Nah suck a perma ban. Because on a game you should be able to call someone a dumbass for being a dumbass they got the handy mute button RIGHT THERE.

But hey, instant perma ban. Alright I guess it's settled I am a toxic asshole. I was on like 500 games on chat restriction last season. Spent all of season 2-3 not talking because I refused to use chat. Lost one account for literally doing nothing but playing against a premade and 10 reports = instant ban.

replies.body:
_ I was on like 500 games on chat restriction last season._  = Your warning. a HUGE warning.

You got exactly what you deserved and nothing of value was lost, maybe you will learn from it.
It puzzles me why Riot doesn't punish instalocking and obvious trolling.
Because blind picks. Trying to erase trolls (and determine who is a troll and who is just new - people who want to play meta dont play blinds) from blinds would be beyond futile.

This was ranked. It's only trolling in ranked that makes me angry. I played ad janna was feeding but didn't flame just got all sad saying "Welp, can't do anything now lol" Lost that game but in ranked I want to win, so of course I'm trying as hard as I can and when our mid just leaves mid so I have to hold and then a zed 1 shots me and the pantheon replies with passive agressive douchery it sets everyone off.
I completely fail to see how people can instalock in draft, as it is logically impossible.
Instalock isn't exactly a thing in draft but in context it basically just means "ignore everything and lock in what you want".
You just que up and take another role either forcing a 2man mid top or jungle, or have them dodge and lose lp
queues as support. instalocks teemo. goes top

Severe outbursts have always been able to escalate punishments. If you post the chat logs I can probably help you understand specifically what got you banned.

That said, your attitude here is going to do you no favors. If anything it is just a demonstration of why you needed to be permanently banned.

The chat restrictions reset, but the 14 day ban stayed with you when they changed the system. Sorry for your luck. Half the perm bans are worthy, and the other half are people that respond to toxicity too often with counter toxicity and get axed solely on that count.

While I admit I was incredibly toxic maybe last or 2 seasons ago. This season the most toxic thing I say on average is "Ez" at the end of surrender games or "lol you idiot" when our bot lane tries diving.

The system was changed in Aug-2015 to not give out "perma chat restrictions", instead it now has a 4 tier punishment system:

* 10 game chat restrict
* 25 game chat restrict
* 14-day ban
* permaban

In your 14-day ban reform card & email, you were clearly notified that your next punishment is a permaban.

Guess your right I don't remember a 2 week ban but maybe in season 3-4 still you get 4 chances in your entire league career. However I had much longer than a 25 game chat restrict, it was a 40 game then a 35 then a 30 down to 5 and another 10. It was 2-3 months of chat restrict I was fine with it.

You can skip punishment tiers if you were extremely toxic. 

So its either:

* you skipped from 25 game chat restrict to Permaban
* You forgot about the 14-day ban
* you are permabanned, not for toxicity, but for something else (If your account was hacked, or there was a chargeback, you can get your account back). When you log in it will tell you what you were banned for.
* you are lying to us

Eitherway, you know what you did. I don't believe there are any other options to select from.

It told me why I was banned for my abuse. Don't call me a liar however. I did get a 2 week ban about a year and a half ago. BEFORE I was put on chat restriction. Punishments should reset each season not once in your life.

You can get perma banned for saying certain things.

Pretty sure stuff like racism, threats, wishing death or harm upon someone, hate speech, etc can be grounds for an instant ban if Riot sees fit.

And I'm pretty sure a Rioter is the one to ban you, not the system.
